document: FUNDAMENTAL ADHESIVE STUDIES OF BLOCK COPOLYMERS by Margaret Mary Sheridan Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy in Chemistry APPROVED: T.C. Ward, Chairman D.W. Dwight M.A. Oglioruso J.E. McGrath J.P. Wightman October, 1985 Blacksburg, Virginia
